Text: Hey...-inspiron-...Is there any way to RSS your A State of Trance episodes only?

great track buddy, thanks..
and congrats for the skull :D you deserve it bro, keep it up ;)

YAY TRUSTED!!!

I also would like to know if we could get an RSS of just your ASOT releases, but I don't think TPB lets you filter. You might need to filter on your client instead by using string matching.

Or inspiron can slow down on the releases :)~
